name: Rolando Locomotov!
description:
There’s a new superhero in town... Rolando Locomotov! He lives on the moon. He rescues children. And he can fly. Parents and children alike will love joining Rolando and his friends on their adventures.

Follow us on social networks for updates:
https://www.facebook.com/imoolt/

LEARN AS YOU PLAY
Your child can enjoy playtime with a purpose with Rolando’s educational mini-games, and you can take a break, confident that your little one is learning something useful. The reliable and reponsible Rolando Locomotov teaches kids many life lessons - for example, the importance of not to going out without a grownup or what is and isn’t edible, in a playful way. As well as these lessons, the app is also chock-full of fun, simple puzzles and brainteasers.

BE CREATIVE
Help your children create their own masterpieces! The Creative Locations mode lets players create their own picture, or even transform a favorite family photograph that they can send to family members or print.
This is a fun developmental game with characters your children will love.

FEATURES
▪ Educational games that aid in development for children aged 3 years and up
▪ Designed to be gender neutral and fun for both boys and girls
▪ Colourful graphics, cheerful music and easy-to-use controls
▪ Children learn as they play
▪ No ads in the game
▪ No in-app purchases

User Agreement: http://i-mult.tlum.ru/agreement-overall
Privacy Policy: http://i-mult.tlum.ru/privacy

If you have any issues or suggestions about the game, please contact our support service at support@i-moolt.com
